original_text: So David made a strong promise to Saul. Then Saul returned to his home. But David and his men went back to the place where they had been hiding.
korean_text: 다윗이 사울에게 맹세하매 사울은 집으로 돌아가고 다윗과 그의 사람들은 요새로 올라가니라

sentences.original_text: So David made a strong promise to Saul.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다윗은 사울에게 강력한 약속을 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then Saul returned to his home.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후 사울은 자신의 집으로 돌아갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: But David and his men went back
to the place where they had been hiding.
